chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, through this video, you will understand the meaning of coding and programming properly.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, in this video, what I am going to tell you today, I wish someone would have told me 5-6 years ago.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, it would be fun. My life changes a little.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: The thing I have learned from programming, it changes a little.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, you do anything through computer. You write in SQL, in code python, in anything.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Here, this tutorial is from C. But, I generally talk to you guys that in any language, if you write any code,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then why do you do programming? Can't we say this to the computer,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: that you write a hello word, do this, do that, why can't we do this?

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: I will tell you today. Guys, programming is in any language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: It is a way of interaction between us and the computer.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: It is a way through which we tell the computer what we want to do.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: In this way, I am using Hindi language to express my emotions.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And I am explaining to you guys what C language is. Why do you do programming, why do you do coding.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Similarly, to tell the computer that you want to write a hello word on the screen,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: or you want to record your audio, or you want to watch a movie.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: To make such computer programs, you have to use a language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: To interact with the computer, you have to use a thing, you have to use a programming language,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: you have to use a medium. This is the medium,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: this is the medium of programming language, which you tell your CPU

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: what you want to do. Just like I am talking to you guys in Hindi,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: like I am telling you in Hindi or in English, if you talk to someone,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: we understand each other's emotions, we understand each other's emotions.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Similarly, to interact with the computer, you have to use programming language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, do you like these videos? If you have any questions,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: do you like these videos? If you have any videos that you like,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and you want me to make videos like this, then click the like button.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, a computer is a very dumb machine.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Yes, you guys are right. A computer is a very dumb machine.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And to explain it, to explain its CPU,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: which is called the brain of computer, the central processing unit.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: If you have not heard it, then I will tell you. The CPU, which is the brain of the computer,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: is executed by the instructions there. So, the CPU

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: needs the exact language that is understood by it.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: What to do? If you send it an instruction,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then copy it in this, then it will copy it. Do it like this, do it like this.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: It needs the exact language in its language. How to do it.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And if you guys speak in Hindi, like, hello, print, do it like this,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then it will not understand at all. This is the problem of the computer.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That is why I called the computer a dumb machine. Unfortunately,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: this language, which is called the CPU, is the language of 0s and 1s.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: If we can say it, then it will be very difficult for us to

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: do small things in our computer. So, what is its solution? Its solution is simple.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: For this, you have to go up to a level of abstraction.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: I will explain what I mean. Guys, any computer system

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: has abstraction layers. That is, the CPU language

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: feeds something else. And it reacts accordingly.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: This layer of abstraction comes in your mouse and keyboard.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: You pressed the button of your keyboard, helped you to travel

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: instructions. And from there, your instruction was reached

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: the CPU language. Similarly, if you guys make any program,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then you guys want to tell the CPU what you want to do.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: What program you want to launch, what you want to do,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: what file you want to copy. There are many aspects in programming.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And we will learn all those things in the tutorial series. Basically,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: you just understand this. Don't get confused at all. The computer,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: which is a dumb machine, we write programming language to make

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: its language. That is, we compile the programming language

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and convert it into machine language, which finally understands the CPU.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And if we say this language in natural language,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then it will not be possible to execute instructions for CPU.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Now, I know that you guys are beginners, you are starting programming.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: To explain all this, I had told you all this. Now, after meeting the cool,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: you just understand that we cannot directly talk to the computer.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: We cannot talk to it in English, Hindi, Punjabi, Urdu.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: We want a programming language to interact with it.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: The programming language, the way you have to learn a French, German language,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: you have to learn it. And this course is for this. I am going to explain this programming language

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: in a very good way in this course. Don't get confused here.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Don't understand that I told you that computer doesn't understand natural language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, you will be thinking how virtual assistants work.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, guys, virtual assistants are a program in themselves, which is written

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: through some programming language. Like Siri, and Microsoft's

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Cortana, if you say anything, then it is a computer programming. So,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: if you have a natural language processing, then programming is also needed.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: No technology has been made that you guys speak something and directly understand the CPU

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and execute the instructions. Like you guys say that I want a website

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: where it is like this, this, this, this, do this, click this, click this, click that,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and automatically, 100% Cote will be generated.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Today, no technology is available in this day and you guys have to do programming.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Human intervention will always be required. That is why programming demand

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: is increasing. Like new systems are being

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: added in the market. It is not like programming is getting more

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: expensive. AI machine learning is not yet reaching that far.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That you guys should replace it, replace computer programmers.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And the demand for C programming like language is increasing.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: According to that, we will see the C programming jobs

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: increasing in the market. Guys, no one is going to take the C's

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: concept of C's history, but the history of C's history is very interesting.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: I would like to tell you that C programming language was made

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: by Dennis Richie in 1872 in AT&T Bell Labs.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: AT&T Bell Labs means American Telephone & Telegraph which is located in the USA.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: There, Dennis Richie established C programming.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: It is not like C programming is the first programming language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Like before C programming, there were many programming languages like B, BCPL.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: But the thing was that in C, people enjoyed it without any advertisement

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: or promotion or any investment. C programming caught the

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: speed and speed of the programers. That it became the first choice of

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: programming language. If I talk about the languages that came before C,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then there are Algon, BCPL, B, then in 1972, there was traditional C.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Where Dennis Richie made the first version of C. And there people

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: enjoyed it. It is like language. It means it was fun.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, when we used to do programming, people and the programming we do today

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: have a lot of difference. Today we have IDE, we have faster computers.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: We can do programming very well. But in the olden days, when people

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: used to do programming, they didn't have a good environment.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And programming for them was not as easy as it is for us today.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That is why Dennis Richie is considered a genius.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Dennis Richie was expired in October 12, 2011.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Indeed, he gave programming a new shape and he was worthy of being a

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: genius. In C programming language, Dennis Richie added very good features.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Like memory management, portability, mid-level, structured.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And with that, recursions, pointers. He made it so easy that people

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: started to adopt C without the old language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: He was independent and he could compile it for any machine.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And he would execute it in that machine. So, I wanted to tell you

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: as much as I could about why C came into existence. Why did we have to make C?

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Why did Dennis Richie make C? Why did people need C?

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: We have given many examples in the software industry where

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: something that was not good could have been better than that.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And all the people came there. I would like to give you an example.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: On the day of the launch of the social networking platform, all the people

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: came to Facebook and left Facebook behind.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Similarly, there are many examples like browser, Google Chrome, better.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: People left the Internet Explorer. We have many more examples.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, you should understand why people adopted C.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Why don't people adopt a reliable, simple and easy to use language?

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And in the world of today, in which the tools and technology are in the industry

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: there are so many companies on a daily basis. And a language

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: that has been standing on its own for almost 50 years and is going to make

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: its 50th birthday C language, that language will have to be good.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That language was liked by people for 50 years. I would like to talk about a topic

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: that people say that already C has replaced C++, C hash

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and Java Python. Now, C is useless.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Now, C has been behind. So, I will clear this doubt for you.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: See, the C programming language is still as powerful as it used to be

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and its demand is increasing day by day. People will say

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: that C++ is more than C. But I would like to tell you that

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: to learn C++, you have to learn the concept of C.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And C++ has been made through C. C has been made ahead.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That is why its name has been given C++ and D has not been given.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, the C++ that Stoustrup made,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: has been made by giving C object oriented features.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, if you feel that you will learn C++ directly

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: without learning C, then I will tell you. It is not like that.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: If you learn C first, then you will be able to become a good programmer.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: I am making these things from my experience. But I would like to tell you

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: that the right way is to learn C and then go to C++. Because C has

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: basics and it has some advanced stuff in C++ like object oriented programming

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: and inheritance, polymorphism, classes, objects.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: So, it will be difficult to understand all these things.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That is why I will tell you to complete a beginner C.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And believe me, if you are studying C, then you are making your basic fundamentals strong.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: Once you understand the fundamentals of programming, then you can learn any language

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: because the basic things should come to your mind.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: After that, you can learn anything and learn any way. Once you know

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: that you are doing all these things, variables, functions,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: conditionals, all these things are almost the same in every language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That is why I will tell you to learn C programming language and make your basic fundamentals strong.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: And I will not point out again and again, but C programming language is extremely fast.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: If you want to squeeze your performance and write a better program

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: which is fast and reliable, then you can use C programming language.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: That is why in the video game industry, where you

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: need a good speed and the speed is very important,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: you can use C and C++.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: We will learn C programming very systematically. We will start with basic things.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: We will start from the bottom and then advance slowly.

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: As you all know any language, first you learn its alphabet,

chunks.title: What Is Coding & C Programming Language  C Tutorial In Hindi #2.mp4
chunks.text: then you learn to make words, then you learn to make sentences,
